gameDetails.name: Everdell: Extra! Extra!
gameDetails.description:
This expansion was released by polish publisher Rebel. It contains 15 Extra! Extra! Cards that can be found in Collector's Edition and Glimmergold Pack. In Poland it is a regular expansion, which you can buy in store.
